data.message: Eminem, please come to Bakersfield California to perform, at least once or twice. You have a lot of fans out here that haven't seen you perform. I've been dying to see you perform for many years. Please come. I'm one of your biggest fans in this whole world. You've helped me through my life, it was tough growing up, & if it wasn't for you & your music. Well I don't know where I'd be today. I still listen to you till this very day. I just like to have to a chance to see you perform here in Bakersfield.
